title: Crunchyroll Winter 2023 Simulcast Slate Offers Largest Line-Up Yet
description: The Crunchyroll Winter Simulcast 2023 slate is the biggest anime line-up yet, with TRIGUN STAMPEDE, VINLAND SAGA Season 2, and more!
author: Adi Tantimedh

title: Superman & Lois, James Gunn/DCU, Sandman & More: BCTV Daily Dispatch
description: In today's BCTV Daily Dispatch: James Gunn/DCU/Superman/Henry Cavill, Superman & Lois, SNL, The Sandman, The Nevers/#Westworld & tons more!
author: Ray Flook

title: Casting News: New Scrabble Host, Kaia Gerber in Ryan Murphy Series and More
description: Comedian Craig Ferguson is taking over as host of The CW’s Scrabble, replacing Raven-Symoné, who will remain an executive producer on the recently renewed game show. Both Scrabble and Trivial Pursuit, hosted by LeVar Burton, have been picked up for 30-episode second seasons to air in 2026 on The CW. “We are excited to continue […]
author: Vlada Gelman

title: Angela Bassett Fuels 9-1-1 Fan Theory About Bobby’s ‘Death’ — Plus, What’s Next for Athena in Season 9?
description: One of the best things about Angela Bassett? She never has to do the thing, yet she always does. And we thank her for that. The 9-1-1 star dropped by Good Morning America on Monday to promote Mission Impossible: The Final Reckoning, during which the co-hosts asked for her thoughts on Peter Krause’s recent departure […]
author: Andy Swift
